mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure the mobile layout is optimized for all screen sizes by improving the font size and button placements.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and leverage browser caching to improve page load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Add relevant meta tags, alt text for images, and improve content structure for better search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Improve navigation flow and ensure the information is easily accessible, especially on mobile devices.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking form by reducing unnecessary steps and enhancing the clarity of booking options.
tips: Optimize images for faster load times.
